name: Ernst Lucas
description:
“Take a chance. I am passionate in so many aspects of my life, looking for my equal. Ultimate goal for everyone is to take a chance and connect with someone, whether it is for a short time or hopefully, on a long term basis.
Developing a friendship first and by getting to know someone through dating and most importantly communication, with any luck can develop into something meaningful. Starting off developing a strong friendship could lead up to the old saying (” Love is Friendship set on Fire”).
Seeking someone who wants to “complement” my life as I wish to do the same for them. Strong in their Christian faith as I, but do enjoy having fun. Would like to continue life’s journey with my soul-mate experiencing the exciting journey that fate has in store for us, enjoying learning about each other and exploring old and new places together. Enjoy have fun as well as quiet times, it is about quality time with someone special. My priorities are family and friends and would like to share that with someone Very compassionate, as well as passionate with people I care about. Communication and honesty are high on my list of needs. If you like to communicate and are sincere and honest, then let’s “strike up as match”
